statements: SELECT * FROM spending_trends WHERE category = 'Food' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, category, expense_amount FROM spending_trends WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT expense_amount, category, date FROM spending_trends WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM spending_trends ORDER BY date DESC, expense_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM spending_trends GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT * FROM spending_trends WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM spending_trends GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT category) AS unique_categories FROM spending_trends;
SELECT user_id, category, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM spending_trends GROUP BY user_id, category ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM spending_trends WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM transactions ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, category FROM transactions WHERE category LIKE 'Food%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY join_date ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, spending_category, amount, transaction_date FROM spending_patterns;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT user_id, decision_id, decision_date, decision_description FROM financial_decisions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_name, birthdate, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, spending_category, amount, transaction_date FROM spending_patterns WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_name, birthdate FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users WHERE birthdate = '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_name, birthdate, location FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_name, birthdate FROM users ORDER BY birthdate DESC, user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, birthdate, location FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%York%' AND birthdate > '1985-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trends LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM trends WHERE category='Technology';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM trends ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, u.name, u.email, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.date ASC;
SELECT c.name AS category_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN categories c ON t.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT u.name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_spent FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' GROUP BY u.name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM spending_patterns ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT date, category, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT * FROM income WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT item, cost FROM expenses WHERE cost < 50 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_patterns ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM income WHERE amount > 5000 AND source IN ('Salary', 'Bonus') ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE balance > 10000 AND account = 'Emergency Fund' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT item, cost, date FROM expenses WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date ASC, cost DESC;
